response.original_title: Mickey Mouse: The Black and White Years, Volume One
response.overview: This historic retrospective spans seven years, from the very first black and white Mickey Mouse cartoon (1928) to the last (1935). Each cartoon has been painstakingly restored and is presented in its original black and white form as it was first seen in theaters.
response.title: Mickey Mouse: The Black and White Years, Volume One

titles.title: Mickey Mouse: The Black & White Years, Volume 1
